mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MB_ID, MB_NICKNAME, MB_EMAIL, MB_PASSWORD, MB_ROLE) VALUES (#{i_mb_id}, #{i_mb_nickname}, #{i_mb_email}, #{i_mb_password}, #{i_mb_role})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER MB WHERE MB.MB_ID = #{w_mb_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MB_NICKNAME = #{u_mb_nickname}, MB_EMAIL = #{u_mb_email}, MB_PASSWORD = #{u_mb_password}, MB_ROLE = #{u_mb_role} WHERE MB_ID = #{w_mb_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MEMBER MB WHERE MB.MB_ID = #{w_mb_id}
